mapper.insert: insert into recruit_member( recruit_board_id, member_id) values( #{recruitBoardId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select * from recruit_member rm left join recruit_board rb on rm.recruit_board_id = rb.recruit_board_id where rm.member_id = #{memberId} order by rb.recruit_board_id desc
select * from recruit_member where member_id = #{memberId} and recruit_board_id = #{recruitBoardId}
mapper.delete: delete from recruit_member where member_id = #{memberId} and recruit_board_id = #{recruitBoardId}
mapper.select: select rcm.member_id, m.nickname, m.email, m.birth_date, m.introduce, m.gender from recruit_board rcb left outer join recruit_member rcm on rcb.recruit_board_id=rcm.recruit_board_id inner join member m on rcm.member_id=m.member_id where rcb.recruit_board_id=1 and rcm.state is null
